entry.name: jQuery.effects.removePlaceholder
entry.title: jQuery.effects.removePlaceholder()

argument.name: element
argument.desc: The original element that has an associated placeholder.

entry.desc: Removes a placeholder created with jQuery.effects.createPlaceholder().

longdesc.p: Removes the placeholder for an element. This method is safe to call even if jQuery.effects.createPlaceholder() did not create a placeholder.
